ing: 1/2 cup PHILADELPHIA Chive & Onion 1/3 Less Fat than Cream Cheese
2 cucumbers, cut lengthwise in half, seeded
des: "So fast and easy, hollowed out cucumber 'boats' are filled with a creamy chive and onion mixture with grated carrots, then cut into bite-size pieces."
ins:
Reserve 2 Tbsp. carrots. Mix remaining carrots with cream cheese; spoon into cucumber shells. Top with reserved carrots.
Cut each cucumber half into 5 pieces to serve.
